headline: What happens if JPM buys Apple Card from Goldman
summary: Investing.com -- JPMorgan (NYSE:JPM) could regain the top spot in U.S. credit cards if it acquires Goldman Sachs’ Apple Card portfolio, a potential $17 billion deal that Wells Fargo analysts say makes “strategic sense” for both sides.
